entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who sat on the spindly chair to wait. He makes a loud crunching noise when he jumps up.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned by name and described as having his mother's eyes. His mother had bought her first wand in the shop.

entities.name: the old man
entities.description: The old man is introduced as a soft-spoken individual with wide, pale eyes who seems to know Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry's mother
entities.description: Harry's mother is mentioned as having bought her first wand in the shop when she was 10 and a quarter inches long.
